original_text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies, then know that the desolation thereof is nigh.
korean_text: 너희가 예루살렘이 군대들에게 에워싸이는 것을 보거든 그 멸망이 가까운 줄을 알라

sentences.original_text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희가 예루살렘이 군대에 둘러싸인 것을 볼 때에

sentences.original_text: then know that the desolation thereof is nigh
